mapper.select: SELECT lcode , scode , scode_nm FROM scodes WHERE use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM AS rn , B.BOOK_ID , B.BOOK_NM , BOOK_PUBL_CO , BOOK_WRITER , B.BOOK_COVER , B.BOOK_COVER_PATH FROM ( SELECT * FROM BUCKET_BOOK WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND BUCKET_DONE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY BUCKET_ORD ) A , BOOK B WHERE A.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID AND ROWNUM < 6

SELECT ROWNUM AS rn , A.CMMNTY_ID , A. CMMNTY_TITLE , A.CMMNTY_WRITER , M.MEMBER_NM , TO_CHAR( A.INS_DT , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INS_DT FROM ( SELECT * FROM COMMUNITY WHERE CMMNTY_FL_CD = '03' AND PROC_DONE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY INS_DT ) A , MEMBER M WHERE A.CMMNTY_WRITER = M.MEMBER_ID AND ROWNUM < 6

SELECT ROWNUM AS rn , BOOK_ID , BOOK_NM , BOOK_PUBL_CO , BOOK_WRITER , BOOK_COVER , BOOK_COVER_PATH , INS_DT FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id} AND BCNFM_ID IS NULL AND BOOK_CNFM_YN = 'N' ORDER BY INS_DT ) WHERE ROWNUM < 6

SELECT A.RN , A.REVIEW_TITLE , SUBSTR ( A.REVIEW_CONTENTS, 1 , 250 ) || '....' AS REVIEW_CONTENTS , A.REVIEW_WRITER , ( SELECT MEMBER_NM FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = A.REVIEW_WRITER ) AS REVIEW_WRITER_NM , B.BOOK_NM , B.BOOK_ID , B.BOOK_COVER , B.BOOK_COVER_PATH , B.BOOK_PUBL_CO , B.BOOK_WRITER FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REVIEW_LIKEIT DESC ) AS RN , R.* FROM REVIEW R ) A , BOOK B WHERE A.BOOK_ID = B.BOOK_ID AND RN < 6
